episodes.title: The Terrible Trio
episodes.plot: Three rich youths who commit armed robbery for fun are pursued by Batman as their irresponsible hobby escalates into potentially worse deeds.

episodes.title: Showdown
episodes.plot: While the Dynamic Duo race to stop Ra's Al Ghul from performing a kidnapping, the wild west story of how he was once opposed by the disfigured bounty hunter, Jonah Hex, is told.

episodes.title: Catwalk
episodes.plot: Catwoman is trying to go straight, but is recruited by The Ventriloquist as a jewel thief.

episodes.title: A Bullet for Bullock
episodes.plot: Det. Bullock reluctantly asks for Batman's assistance when he is convinced someone is trying to kill him.

episodes.title: The Lion and the Unicorn
episodes.plot: Red Claw kidnaps an old colleague of Alfred's from the British Secret Service, to gain access to a hidden missile silo.
